short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear your browser cache and other data without logging out of your sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One of the main drawbacks when browsing the Internet, especially for users, developers, and designers, is the need to clear the browser's cache to correctly visualize changes on websites. This problem is particularly noticeable when modifications are made to Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), which control the appearance and layout of web pages.

When CSS files are updated, the browser may retain old versions in its cache, resulting in incorrect or outdated site displays. This forces users to constantly clear the cache to ensure they are viewing the most recent version of the design, a process that can be tedious and disruptive to the workflow.

Cosmic Cache Cleaner revolutionizes this task by allowing you to efficiently clean the cache without affecting your active sessions. This intelligent tool specifically focuses on cache files related to CSS and other web resources, ensuring that you are always viewing the most up-to-date version of a site without the hassle of having to log out and re-authenticate in your various online accounts, unless you voluntarily wish to do so. Cosmic Cache Cleaner also includes a cookie cleaning option as an additional feature of the extension.

This innovative tool optimizes the cleaning process, saving you valuable time and avoiding the frustration of having to repeatedly log in to your favorite sites. Whether you're developing a website, shopping online, or simply browsing the internet, Cosmic Cache Cleaner guarantees a smooth and uninterrupted experience.
